Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
Controller for handling user authentication and password management.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LoginController(UserDB userDB)
    Constructs a new LoginController with a reference to the user database.

    • LoginController

      public LoginController(UserDB userDB)
      Constructs a new LoginController with a reference to the user database.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login(String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the provided credentials.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user
      password - The password of the user
      Returns:
      true if authentication was successful, false otherwise

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the current user.

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Gets the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The current user, or null if no user is logged in

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the password of the current user.
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - The current password
      newPassword - The new password
      Returns:
      true if the password was changed, false otherwise

    • isDefaultPassword

      public boolean isDefaultPassword(String nric, String password)
      Checks if the provided password is equal to the default password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NIRC to check
      password - The password to check
      Returns:
      true if the password is the default password

    • validateNRIC

      public boolean validateNRIC(String nric)
      Validates an NRIC format.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to validate
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC has a valid format, false otherwise
